name: valkey
tagline: A community driven Redis compatible key value store
description: Valkey is an open-source, Redis-compatible in-memory key-value store designed as a community-driven successor. It offers high performance and is operated via command-line tools and Redis protocol clients.

features.title: Redis Compatibility
features.description: Drop-in replacement for Redis with full protocol compatibility

features.title: In
features.description: Store data in memory for microsecond latency and high throughput

features.title: Data Structures
features.description: Support strings, lists, sets, sorted sets, hashes, and more

features.title: Persistence
features.description: Persist data to disk with RDB snapshots and AOF logging for durability

features.title: Replication
features.description: Set up primary-replica replication for high availability and read scaling

features.title: Pub/sub Messaging
features.description: Implement real-time messaging with publish/subscribe channels

features.title: Transactions
features.description: Execute multiple commands atomically with MULTI/EXEC transactions

features.title: Lua Scripting
features.description: Run server-side Lua scripts for complex operations and atomic workflows
